item.title: End of year
item.description: As the end of the Gregorian year approaches once more, we take the time to get full-out sentimental on yâ€™all. Clearly, 2020 has been a somewhat different year for the most of us. In the beginning of it, reports around the Coronavirus affecting China and its billion people surfaced and showed us a glimpse into a different reality. A reality that seemed so far away to be of any relevance to us.
